descriptionHtml:
TacitRed Logic App Ingestion uses a Logic App with managed identity to poll TacitRed's API and ingest compromised credential findings into Microsoft Sentinel via the Logs Ingestion API.

This solution includes:

  • Playbook: Logic App for TacitRed API polling and DCE ingestion

Key Features:

  • Managed identity authentication to Azure Monitor
  • Automated polling on configurable interval
  • Data transformation for Sentinel custom table
